Package Server

Class EventHandler

java.lang.Object
Server.EventHandler
public class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
A class which is designed to process requests from clients. This class consists of a large switch statement which manages the processing and error handling of requests.

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    IDBConnection connection

  • Constructor Details

    • EventHandler

      public EventHandler​(java.util.Properties props) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Establishes a new database connection and session for the logged in user. The connection will exist for the duration of the user session.
      Parameters:
      props - Properties file containing: jdbc.username - sql username jdbc.password - sql password jdbc.ip - sql server address jdbc.schema - sql database name jdbc.port - sql server port serverPort - server client access port
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • EventHandler

      public EventHandler() throws java.sql.SQLException
      A constructor which accepts no parameters. This constructor connects to the mock database for unit testing.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
